title: Is San Francisco the Most Intolerant Place in America?
sub_head: The city government is boycotting much of the United States.
body:
As new school board members take their seats in San Francisco, let’s hope this is the start of a reform era in the city by the Bay. But this week brings a reminder of just how much reform is needed. Believe it or not, San Francisco is now imposing severe economic sanctions upon... most states in the U.S.
The city’s previous school board found it intolerable to have the names of famous Americans on its buildings but was willing to tolerate closed schools and educational failures. The good news is that parents finally decided not to tolerate such misplaced priorities. Amanda Hari of San Francisco’s KRON-TV reports:
